attributes.action: stop ignoring the effects of Motor Neurone Disease
attributes.additional_details:
Motor Neurone Disease kills an avarage of 5 people a day in the U.K. but there is very little support from this Government and indeed previous Governments.

More funds must be made available to the Motor Neurone Disease Association for research and support for both patients & carers.

Our patron is H.R.H. the Princess Royal who does so much.

However this government has done very little if anything to ease the plight of those suffering from M.N.D. despite numerous requests from members of the M.N.D.A. being sent to David Cameron and his predecessors
